## `SetBoxPlotEffect`

Sets box appearance\index{graphs!box plots} (in box plots) for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBoxPlotEffect(BoxEffect barEffect)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`BoxEffect`](#boxeffect) effect | The effect to apply to the bars. |
:::
